text:
Hi @arunputti2, thanks for getting in touch. Please send us a Facebook Message and let us know what type of job you’re looking for.

As JobStreet is not involved in the recruitment process, we are unable to advise on the duration of the whole process. It will depend on individual employer's practice.

You can also visit our website at https://www.jobstreet.com.sg/ to search for jobs that are best suited to your skills and preferences and based on location.

Hi.. My name is Arun Kumar. I am from India.I working as a special education teacher.I have four years experience(working with autistic children) .I would like to work in Singapore.I wanted to know that how many days it will take to complete the process, what are the documents required to apply?Thank you.
Hello, am Gladys. At this time my family needs a nanny and a driver for our son. Anyone interested should kindly message me so we can discuss better. Interested applicant must have a valid passport.
